# Linq Docs

- [How to: Call a Stored Procedure by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-call-a-stored-procedure-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Call a Stored Procedure by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Combine Data with LINQ by Using Joins](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-combine-data-with-linq-by-using-joins.md): Learn more about: How to: Combine Data with LINQ by Using Joins (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Count, Sum, or Average Data by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-count-sum-or-average-data-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Count, Sum, or Average Data by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Filter Query Results by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-filter-query-results-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Filter Query Results by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Find the Minimum or Maximum Value in a Query Result by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-find-the-minimum-or-maximum-value-in-a-query-result.md): Learn more about: How to: Find the Minimum or Maximum Value in a Query Result by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Modify Data in a Database by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-modify-data-in-a-database-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Modify Data in a Database by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query a Database by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-query-a-database-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Query a Database by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Return a LINQ Query Result as a Specific Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-return-a-linq-query-result-as-a-specific-type.md): Learn more about: How to: Return a LINQ Query Result as a Specific Type (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Sort Query Results by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/how-to-sort-query-results-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Sort Query Results by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/index.md): Learn more about: LINQ in Visual Basic
